snippet.title: Into the Depth of the Sky - teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Indie otome game trailer from Thai solo dev! 

Lilith finds herself waking up with no memories in the middle of a battle. Under the unusual circumstances of her amnesia, she is also wanted by the Sage Council, the police of the magic world, for reasons unknown. 

Luckily, her family left her with four cute bodyguards who are equally keen on figuring out what is going on.

Into the Depth of the Sky is a heartwarming fantasy/mystery/slice-of-life otome game with a dash of action. 

Play the teaser demo on itch.io: https://karita0101.itch.io/depthofsky

Follow me on TwitterX: https://twitter.com/karita_solo
